statements: SELECT user_email, user_location FROM location_emails;
SELECT deal_name, deal_description FROM location_emails WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM location_emails WHERE user_location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, user_email FROM location_emails WHERE deal_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT user_email, user_location FROM location_emails ORDER BY user_location ASC, user_email DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_email, user_location, deal_name, deal_description FROM location_emails WHERE user_location = 'New York' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_email, deal_name FROM location_emails WHERE LENGTH(user_email) > 20;
SELECT user_location, COUNT(*) AS total_deals FROM location_emails GROUP BY user_location ORDER BY total_deals DESC;
SELECT user_email, deal_name, deal_description FROM location_emails WHERE deal_description LIKE '%discount%' ORDER BY user_email ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_email, user_location, deal_name FROM location_emails WHERE user_location IN ('Los Angeles', 'San Francisco') ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%';
SELECT location_id, location_name, deal_description FROM locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, l.location_name FROM users AS u JOIN locations AS l ON u.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail%' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.email, l.location_name FROM users AS u LEFT JOIN locations AS l ON u.location_id = l.location_id WHERE u.location_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users, location_id FROM users GROUP BY location_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_users DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT deal_name, deal_description FROM deals WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations ORDER BY country DESC, city ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT deal_name, deal_description FROM deals WHERE location_id = 5 ORDER BY deal_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' OR country = 'USA';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN deals ON users.user_id = deals.location_id WHERE deal_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT deal_name, discount FROM deal_data WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY discount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, deal_id, timestamp FROM email_logs WHERE log_id > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT customer_id, email, full_name FROM customer_data WHERE location_id = 3 ORDER BY email ASC
SELECT deal_name, discount FROM deal_data WHERE discount > 10 AND discount < 20 ORDER BY deal_name
SELECT customer_id, deal_id, timestamp FROM email_logs WHERE TIMESTAMP >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE location_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT deal_name, discount FROM deals WHERE validity_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT location_name, city, state, country FROM locations WHERE location_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, location_id FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC, location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT deal_name, discount, validity_date FROM deals WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY validity_date DESC;
SELECT city, state, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' OR state = 'California';

SELECT u.first_name, l.location_name, d.deal_name FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN locations l ON up.location_id = l.location_id JOIN deals d ON d.location_id = l.location_id;
